buri.ddmsence.util

Class Util

  • Object
    • buri.ddmsence.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends Object
    A collection of stateless utility methods.
    Since:
    0.9.b
    Author:
    Brian Uri!

        public static javax.xml.datatype.DatatypeFactory getDataTypeFactory()

      • toXMLGregorianCalendar

        public static javax.xml.datatype.XMLGregorianCalendar toXMLGregorianCalendar(String date)
        Helper method for DDMS components that use the DDMS custom date. Converts date strings in any of the valid DDMS date types (ddms:CombinedDateType) into an XMLGregorianCalendar. Returns null if the string is empty or not a valid date type.
        Parameters:
        date - the raw date string
        Returns:
        an XMLGregorianCalendar for valid dates, null otherwise.

        Returns:

        Returns an empty string in place of a null one.

        Returns:

      • getXsListAsList

        public static List<String> getXsListAsList(String value)
        Helper method to convert an xs:NMTOKENS data type into a List of Strings.

        The number of items returned is based on the normalization of the whitespace first. So, an xs:list defined as "a b" will return a List of 2 Strings ("a", "b"), and not a List of 4 String ("a", "", "", "b")

        Parameters:
        value - the xs:list style String to parse
        Returns:
        a List (never null)

      • getXsList

        public static String getXsList(List<?> list)
        Converts a list of objects into a space-delimited xs:list, using the object's toString() implementation
        Parameters:
        list - the list to convert
        Returns:
        a space-delimited string, or empty string if the list was empty.

      • booleanHashCode

        public static int booleanHashCode(boolean b)
        Returns an int value for a boolean, for use in a hashCode function.
        Parameters:
        b - the boolean
        Returns:
        1 for true and 0 for false

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(String value)
        Checks if a String value is empty. An empty string is defined as one that is null, contains only whitespace, or has length 0.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check.
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the value is null or zero-length, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the list only has null or empty values

        Returns:

      • requireDDMSValue

        public static void requireDDMSValue(String description,
                                    Object value)
                             throws InvalidDDMSException
        Asserts that a value required for DDMS is not null or empty.
        Parameters:
        description - a descriptive name of the value
        value - the value to check
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the value is null or empty

      • requireDDMSDateFormat

        public static void requireDDMSDateFormat(String date,
                                         String ddmsNamespace)
                                  throws InvalidDDMSException
        Asserts that a date format is one of the 5 types accepted by DDMS.
        Parameters:
        date - the date in its raw XML format
        ddmsNamespace - the DDMS namespace of this date (DDM 4.0.1 and earlier only support 4 types).
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the value is invalid. Does nothing if value is null.

      • requireDDMSQName

        public static void requireDDMSQName(nu.xom.Element element,
                                    String localName)
                             throws InvalidDDMSException
        Asserts that the qualified name of an element matches the expected name and a supported version of the DDMS XML namespace
        Parameters:
        element - the element to check
        localName - the local name to compare to
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the name is incorrect

        Parameters:
        element - the element to check
        namespaceURI - the namespace to check
        localName - the local name to compare to
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name is incorrect
        InvalidDDMSException

      • requireBoundedChildCount

        public static void requireBoundedChildCount(nu.xom.Element parent,
                                            String childName,
                                            int lowBound,
                                            int highBound)
                                     throws InvalidDDMSException
        Checks that the number of child elements with the given name in the same namespace as the parent are bounded.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent element
        childName - the local name of the child
        lowBound - the lowest value the number can be
        highBound - the highest value the number can be
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the number is out of bounds

      • requireValidNCNames

        public static void requireValidNCNames(List<String> names)
                                throws InvalidDDMSException
        Validates that a list of strings contains NCNames. This method uses the built-in Verifier in XOM by attempting to create a new Element with the test string as a local name (Local names must be NCNames).
        Parameters:
        names - a list of names to check
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if any name is not an NCName.

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component
        child - the child component
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if

      • requireValidNCName

        public static void requireValidNCName(String name)
                               throws InvalidDDMSException
        Validates that a string is an NCName. This method relies on Saxon's library methods.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to check
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the name is not an NCName.

        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the name is not an NMTOKEN.

                                int lowBound,
                                int highBound)
        Checks that a number is between two values, inclusive
        Parameters:
        testCount - the number to evaluate
        lowBound - the lowest value the number can be
        highBound - the highest value the number can be
        Returns:
        true if the number is bounded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the range is invalid.

      • listEquals

        public static boolean listEquals(List<?> list1,
                                 List<?> list2)
        Checks if two lists of Objects are identical. Returns true if the lists are the same length and each indexed string also exists at the same index in the other list.
        Parameters:
        list1 - the first list
        list2 - the second list
        Returns:
        true if the lists are of equal size and contain the same objects, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the lists is null

      • nullEquals

                                 Object obj2)
        Checks object equality when the objects could possible be null.
        Parameters:
        obj1 - the first object
        obj2 - the second object
        Returns:
        true if both objects are null or obj1 equals obj2, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the changed string

      • addDDMSAttribute

        public static void addDDMSAttribute(nu.xom.Element element,
                                    String attributeName,
                                    String attributeValue)
        Helper method to add a ddms attribute to an element. Will not add the attribute if the value is empty or null. This method uses the DDMS namespace defined with DDMSVersion.getCurrentVersion().
        Parameters:
        element - the element to decorate
        attributeName - the name of the attribute (will be within the DDMS namespace)
        attributeValue - the value of the attribute

      • addAttribute

        public static void addAttribute(nu.xom.Element element,
                                String prefix,
                                String attributeName,
                                String namespaceURI,
                                String attributeValue)
        Helper method to add an attribute to an element. Will not add the attribute if the value is empty or null.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to decorate
        prefix - the prefix to use (without a trailing colon)
        attributeName - the name of the attribute
        namespaceURI - the namespace this attribute is in
        attributeValue - the value of the attribute

      • addDDMSChildElement

        public static void addDDMSChildElement(nu.xom.Element element,
                                       String childName,
                                       String childValue)
        Helper method to add a ddms child element to an element. Will not add if the value is empty or null.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to decorate
        childName - the name of the child (will be within the DDMS namespace)
        childValue - the value of the attribute

      • buildDDMSElement

        public static nu.xom.Element buildDDMSElement(String name,
                                              String childText)
        Convenience method to create an element in the default DDMS namespace with some child text. The resultant element will use the DDMS prefix and have no attributes or children (yet).
        Parameters:
        name - the local name of the element
        childText - the text of the element

      • buildElement

        public static nu.xom.Element buildElement(String prefix,
                                          String name,
                                          String namespaceURI,
                                          String childText)
        Convenience method to create an element in a namespace with some child text. The resultant element will use a custom prefix and have no attributes or children (yet).
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix to use (without a trailing colon)
        name - the local name of the element
        namespaceURI - the namespace this element is in
        childText - the text of the element

      • buildDDMSAttribute

        public static nu.xom.Attribute buildDDMSAttribute(String name,
                                                  String value)
        Convenience method to create an attribute in the default DDMS namespace. The resultant attribute will use the DDMS prefix and have the provided value.
        Parameters:
        name - the local name of the attribute
        value - the value of the attribute

      • buildAttribute

        public static nu.xom.Attribute buildAttribute(String prefix,
                                              String name,
                                              String namespaceURI,
                                              String value)
        Convenience method to create an attribute in a namespace.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix to use (without a trailing colon)
        name - the local name of the attribute
        namespaceURI - the namespace this attribute is in
        value - the value of the attribute

      • buildXmlDocument

        public static nu.xom.Document buildXmlDocument(InputStream inputStream)
                                        throws IOException
        Loads a XOM object tree from an input stream. This method does no schema validation.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input stream containing the XML document
        Returns:
        a XOM Document
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are problems loading or parsing the input stream

      • commitXml

        public static nu.xom.Element commitXml(String xml)
                                throws InvalidDDMSException
        Attempts to convert arbitrary XML into an Element.
        Parameters:
        xml - the XML string
        Returns:
        a XOM element based upon the XML string
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the element could not be created.

      • getSchematronQueryBinding

        public static String getSchematronQueryBinding(nu.xom.Document schDocument)
                                        throws IOException
        Locates the queryBinding attribute in an ISO Schematron file and returns it.
        Parameters:
        schDocument - the Schematron file as an XML Document
        Returns:
        the value of the queryBinding attribute, or "xslt" if undefined.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are file-related problems with looking up the attribute

      • buildSchematronTransform

        public static nu.xom.xslt.XSLTransform buildSchematronTransform(File schematronFile)
                                                         throws IOException,
                                                                nu.xom.xslt.XSLException
        Takes a Schematron file and transforms it with the ISO Schematron skeleton files.
        1. The schema is preprocessed with iso_dsdl_include.xsl.
        2. The schema is preprocessed with iso_abstract_expand.xsl.
        3. The schema is compiled with iso_svrl_for_xslt1.xsl.

        The XSLTransform instance using the result of the processing is returned. This XSLTransform can then be used to validate DDMS components.

        Parameters:
        schematronFile - the Schematron file
        Returns:
        the XSLTransform instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are file-related problems with preparing the stylesheets
        nu.xom.xslt.XSLException - if stylesheet transformation fails
